hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Managed Inputs
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
mkdir mappings mkdir data mkdir processing mkdir completed mkdir dict mkdir resources mkdir reports
git clone https://github.com/UW-GAC/topmed-dcc-harmonized-phenotypes
find topmed-dcc-harmonized-phenotypes/harmonized-variable-documentation/ -type f -name "*.json" -exec cp {} ./dict/ \;
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/rawData/ processing/ --recursive
java -jar jars/HarmonizedMappingGenerator.jar
aws s3 cp data/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/decoded_data/ --recursive
aws s3 cp completed/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/hrmn/metadata/ --exclude "*" --include "*.json"
aws s3 cp completed/mapping_new_search.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/mappings/
### process the data git clone https://github.com/hms-dbmi/ETLToolSuite-MissionControl
cp ETLToolSuite-MissionControl/GenerateAllConcepts.jar . cp ETLToolSuite-MissionControl/DataAnalyzer.jar jars/ cp ETLToolSuite-MissionControl/Partitioner.jar jars/ cp ETLToolSuite-MissionControl/MergePartitions.jar jars/ cp ETLToolSuite-MissionControl/runpartition.sh .
rm -rf data/* rm -rf processing/* rm -rf completed/* rm -rf mappings/*
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/mappings/mapping_new_search.csv data/mapping.csv
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/decoded_data/ data/ --recursive
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/completed/HRMN_PatientMapping.v2.csv data/
rm -rf resources/job.config
echo "trialid=HRMN" > resources/job.config echo "mappingfile=data/mapping.csv" >> resources/job.config echo "patientmappingfile=data/HRMN_PatientMapping.v2.csv" >> resources/job.config echo "usepatientmapping=Y" >> resources/job.config
echo "Numeric mappings before Analyzer $(grep "NUMERIC" data/mapping.csv | wc -l)" echo "Text mappings before Analyzer $(grep "TEXT" data/mapping.csv | wc -l)" java -jar jars/DataAnalyzer.jar -propertiesfile resources/job.config -mappingskipheaders N -trialid HRMN
cp completed/mapping.csv data/mapping.csv
echo "Numeric mappings after Analyzer $(grep "NUMERIC" data/mapping.csv | wc -l)" echo "Text mappings after Analyzer $(grep "TEXT" data/mapping.csv | wc -l)"
java -jar jars/Partitioner.jar -propertiesfile resources/job.config -mappingskipheaders N -trialid HRMN
bash runpartition.sh -j 8 -m 3g -c 'config.part*.config' -r resources/
java -jar jars/MergePartitions.jar -propertiesfile resources/job.config
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp completed/HRMN_allConcepts.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/completed/HRMN_allConcepts_new_search_with_data_analyzer.csv
tar -zvcf etl-reports-data-analyzer.tar.gz reports/*
aws s3 cp etl-reports-data-analyzer.tar.gz s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/reports/
